job.title: Machine Learning research Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtML Research EngineerltstronggtltpgtltpgtLOCATION San Francisco CA  TimeltpgtltpgtltstronggtABOUT the roleltstronggtltpgtltpgtIn this role youll work with our researchers to do cuttingedge deep learning researchconducting experiments creating infrastructure and developing tooling ampamp visualizationswith the goal of developing more humanlike machine intelligenceltpgtltpgtltstronggtExample projectsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtImplement a selfsupervised network using contrastive and reconstruction lossesltligtltligtCreate a library on top of PyTorch to enable efficient network architecture searchltligtltligtImplement networks from newly published papersltligtltligtRun massively parallel experiments to understand all variants of an architectureltligtltligtDevelop more realistic simulations for training our agentsltligtltligtCreate visualizations to help us deeply understand what our networks learn and whyltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtBenefitsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWork directly on creating software with humanlike intelligenceltligtltligtGenerous compensation equity and benefitsltligtltligt20K yearly budget for selfimprovement coaching courses conferences etcltligtltligtActively cocreate and participate in a positive intentional team cultureltligtltligtSpend time learning reading papers and deeply understanding prior workltligtltligtFrequent team events dinners offsites and hanging outltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtABOUT youltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtPassionate about understanding the fundamentals of intelligenceltligtltligtVery comfortable writing PythonltligtltligtExcited to be a worldclass ML engineerltligtltligtA fan of pair programmingltligtltligtPassionate about engineering best practicesltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgt
